amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for the U.S. Customs Service by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the U.S. Customs Service from implementing regulations that change the designation of an airport in Orlando (FL) from user fee status to point entry status until the new designation can be reviewed.

action.text: Kingston amendment (A016) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Kingston amendment (A016) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
